commands.name: az security automation create_or_update
commands.summary: Creates or update a security automation.
examples: az security automation create_or_update -g Sample-RG -n sampleAutomation -l eastus --scopes '[{"description": "Scope for 487bb485-b5b0-471e-9c0d-10717612f869", "scopePath": "/subscriptions/487bb485-b5b0-471e-9c0d-10717612f869"}]' --sources '[{"eventSource":"SubAssessments","ruleSets":null}]' --actions '[{"actionType":"EventHub","eventHubResourceId":"subscriptions/212f9889-769e-45ae-ab43-6da33674bd26/resourceGroups/ContosoSiemPipeRg/providers/Microsoft.EventHub/namespaces/contososiempipe-ns/eventhubs/surashed-test","connectionString":"Endpoint=sb://contososiempipe-ns.servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=Send;SharedAccessKey=dummy=;EntityPath=dummy","SasPolicyName":"dummy"}]'

commands.name: az security automation list
commands.summary: List all security automations under subscription/resource group.

commands.name: az security automation validate
commands.summary: Validates a security automation model before create or update.
examples: az security automation validate -g Sample-RG -n sampleAutomation -l eastus --scopes '[{"description": "Scope for 487bb485-b5b0-471e-9c0d-10717612f869", "scopePath": "/subscriptions/487bb485-b5b0-471e-9c0d-10717612f869"}]' --sources '[{"eventSource":"SubAssessments","ruleSets":null}]' --actions '[{"actionType":"EventHub","eventHubResourceId":"subscriptions/212f9889-769e-45ae-ab43-6da33674bd26/resourceGroups/ContosoSiemPipeRg/providers/Microsoft.EventHub/namespaces/contososiempipe-ns/eventhubs/surashed-test","connectionString":"Endpoint=sb://contososiempipe-ns.servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=Send;SharedAccessKey=dummy=;EntityPath=dummy","SasPolicyName":"dummy"}]'
